logs.step1_raw_spec:
```
Define function separate_vowels_and_consonants that takes an input_string as argument.

     Begin
         Define vowels string as "aeiouAEIOU"
         Initialize empty list vowel_chars
         Initialize empty list consonant_chars
         For each character in input_string:
             If the character is in vowels:
                 Add character to vowel_chars
             Else:
                 Add character to consonant_chars
         Return concatenated string of vowel_chars + consonant_chars
     End
```
